DOC.brief_summary: Phase 3 study to examine the relation between antihypertensive effect and baseline factors exploratively, compared to olmesartan medoxomil in patients with essential hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Study of CS-3150 Compared to Olmesartan in Patients With Essential Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects aged 20 years or older at informed consent Subjects with essential hypertension during runin period (mean 24hr systolic blood pressure SBP ≥ 130 and diastolic blood pressure DBP ≥ 80 mmHg and Sitting SBP ≥ 140 mmHg and < 180 mmHg, Sitting DBP ≥ 90 mmHg and < 110 mmHg) Secondary hypertension or malignant hypertension Diabetes mellitus with albuminuria Serum potassium level < 3.5 or ≥ 5.1 mEq/L Reversed daynight life cycle including overnight workers eGFR < 60 mL/min/1.73 m^2.
